name: Dodge
text: Attach this to your character for one turn.\n\nYou are Dodging.

name: Ice Lance
text: Deal 3 cold damage to an enemy.

name: Holy Blow
text: Deal W+3 Holy damage to an adjacent enemy.

name: Second Wind
text: Target ally shuffles their graveyard into their library. gains 4 hp. and draws a card. Exhaust.
